articles.author: ET Spotlight Special
articles.title: Google News may soon be coming to WearOS 3 watches: Report - Economic Times
articles.description: Google unveiled the Pixel Watch, along with the Pixel 7 and Pixel 7 Pro, during its  Made By Google  event. Following the release of the company's first wristwatch, Google appears to have pushed developers to produce more WearOS apps.
articles.content:
Google is developing a simpler version of the Google News feed that will allow consumers to read directly from their smartwatches.

articles.title: Google's 'My Ad Center' brings more control, customisations over the ads that you see - News9 LIVE
articles.description: Ads seen on Google's YouTube, search, and Discover will now be more customised
articles.content: Google is starting to roll out its 'My Ad Center,' first presented at Google I/O 2022, which gives users more control of the advertisements they see and opt out of seeing some ads entirely. Ads seen … [+1517 chars]

articles.title: BGMI Return: Fresh Leaks Suggest Jio or Airtel Could be New Publishers of The Game, Might Return by February 2 - MySmartPrice
articles.description: Popular BGMI player Saumraj commented on BGMI's return. He said that the game will be back by February 2023 with Jio or Airtel as its new publisher.
